content: Are anyone using subdivision codes from ISO on address? From http://build.fhir.org/datatypes-extras.html#Address I can only see extensions related to HL7v3 mappings - but nothing that more directly refers to sub divisions (http://oid-info.com/get/1.0.3166.2) eg. https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:code:3166:DK
I haven't heard of any extension like that.
